As a Senior Field Engineer, I excel in troubleshooting and root cause analysis of mechanical systems, combining my technical expertise with a commitment to HSE standards. I have a proven track record in engine maintenance and automation, ensuring high performance and reliability in complex systems. My strong communication and intercultural skills enhance my ability to deliver exceptional customer service and technical reporting.
While my background includes extensive experience in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for software solutions, I have also led cross-functional teams to achieve operational excellence. My hands-on experience with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** complements my ability to integrate emerging technologies effectively into field operations. Additionally, I possess deep knowledge of **Azure** and **AWS**, which aids in implementing cloud-based solutions that streamline processes and improve system functionalities.
